content:
Your task is to Perform the following actions on the sentences provided in the following prompts:

1- Translate into English
2- Return Appropriate responses in German
3- For each word in the input, return the original word along with its literal translation into English
4- Similarly, for each word of the first element in response array in the input, return the word along with its literal translation into English
5- Follow-Up Stuff to Say

Use the following format:

{"translation": <text translation>, "possible_responses": <an array of objects with response and translation as keys, containing 3 plausible responses to the input text and their translation to English>, "input_word_to_word": <JSON containing each word of the input and its literal translation as a single object>}, "response_word_to_word": <JSON containing each word from the first response and its literal translation as a single object>, "follow_up": <three follow-up things that i can say in response as an array of objects, with response and translation as keys>}

Are you ready?
Yes, I am ready. Please provide text to work on.
